branchCategory.name: LER, Electric Rotary Table
branchCategory.description: The original LER is capable of 90°, 180°, or 310 / 320° rotation from the home position. Suitable applications will require a repetitive rotate-and-return motion, such as parts transfer with reorientation.

relatedProductsItem.name: JXC*1, Step Motor Controller, Fieldbus Direct Input Type for LER
